name: Left Turn Only
description:
The government has banned turning right. but you are hungry! and that aint going to stop you!
Find and Collected the pizza as quickly as possible then race to the finish line one left turn at a time! 
Can you beat my best score on each level and earn a gold medal?
This is my Entry to Kenny Jam 2021 and my first ever Game Jam Participation. 
 The Game more stable if downloaded.
